mapper.insert: INSERT INTO users ( users_email, users_password, users_name, users_gender, users_date_birth, users_auth_code, users_nickname ) VALUES ( #{users_email}, #{users_password}, #{users_name}, #{users_gender}, #{users_date_birth}, #{users_auth_code}, #{users_nickname} )
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(users_email) AS emailCheck FROM users WHERE users_email = #{users_email} AND users_is_quit = 0
SELECT COUNT(users_nickname) AS nickNmCheck FROM users WHERE users_nickname = #{users_nickname} AND users_is_quit = 0
SELECT * FROM users WHERE users_email = #{users_email} AND users_auth_code IS NULL AND users_is_quit = 0
